scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && mkdir -p public/dist server/dist shared/dist
scripts.build: npm run build:public && npm run build:server && npm run build:shared
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n public,server,shared "npm run build:public:watch" "npm run build:server:watch" "npm run build:shared:watch"
scripts.start:server: nodemon --watch server/dist --watch public/dist --watch shared/dist --exec 'clear && node --no-deprecation' server/dist/server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently --raw -n build,server "npm run build:watch" "npm run start:server"
